useCase.name: Real Estate
useCase.title: OpenClaw for Real Estate: AI That Qualifies Leads and Books Showings
useCase.description: Real estate agents use OpenClaw to handle inquiries, qualify buyers, and schedule showings automatically.

solutions.title: Lead Response
solutions.description: Respond to inquiries instantly, day or night.

solutions.title: Buyer Qualification
solutions.description: Ask qualification questions before routing to agents.

solutions.title: Showing Scheduler
solutions.description: Book showings directly on your calendar.
